body_html: cudnn up to 5.1.10 allocated weights irrespective of SKIP_INPUT value, the input weights were not used. As of 5.1.10 and v6 RC it was partially fixed (weights are no longer allocated, biases are allocated and added, numMatrices for getLinLayerParams and matrix "meaning" is the same irrespective of the SKIP_INPUT value, but descriptors with 0 elements are returned for input transformation matrices).
